item.description:
This is a crossover meet up with Party Express.

Come hang out.. $1.00 off drinks at the back bar. Use the door to the right of the main bar, it's the bar room with all of the windows. You must tell them you are Party Express people, discount until 11pm. Karen will host cell 203-828-8235, you can find me by my tye dye MIX T-shirt.
NO COVER CHARGE!!!
Parking lot is small and fills fast but you can park; near the train station, Bank of America lot or a little further out at the courthouse lot, some street parking available too.
item.name: Let's mix it up with the MIX CT! new songs, new friends, New Year!
